title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Everything you need to know about BeyondRounds
subtitleHome: Everything you need to know about BeyondRounds. Can't find what you're looking for?
weAreHereToHelp: We're here to help you find your tribe.
a1: BeyondRounds is a members-only social club designed exclusively for verified doctors. We use a smart matching algorithm to connect you with 3-4 fellow physicians who share your interests, lifestyle, and values — for real friendships, not networking.
q2: How is this different from other networking apps?
a2: We're not about professional networking or dating. BeyondRounds is specifically designed for doctors to make real friends who understand their lifestyle and share their personal interests outside of medicine.
a3: Any verified medical doctor — from medical students and residents to attending physicians and specialists. We manually verify all members through medical license confirmation and photo ID to maintain trust and safety.
a4: Every Thursday at 4 PM, you'll receive a curated group of 3-4 doctors matched based on shared interests, compatible schedules, and city proximity. Our algorithm considers specialty, hobbies, lifestyle preferences, and social style to find your ideal connections.
q5: What if I don't connect with my group?
a5: No pressure! You'll receive a fresh group every week, and our algorithm learns from your feedback to improve future matches. Great friendships take time — we're here to help you find your tribe.
q6: Can I choose my own matches?
a6: Our curated approach is what makes BeyondRounds special. Trust our algorithm — it's designed by doctors, for doctors, and gets smarter with each match.
a7: Your group decides together! Popular spots include coffee shops, restaurants, parks, gyms, or activity-based outings like hiking or sports. RoundsBot (our AI assistant) suggests safe, convenient locations and helps break the ice.
q8: Is it safe to meet people from the app?
a8: Absolutely. Every member is a verified doctor, and we encourage meeting in public places. RoundsBot provides conversation starters and coordinates safe meetup spots. You can report any concerns directly through the app.
q9: What if someone doesn't show up?
a9: We take no-shows seriously. Members get one warning, a temporary pause after the second no-show, and potential removal after the third.
a10: Trial: €9.99 (first month), Founders: €14.99/month (limited time), Core: €29.99/month, Premium: €49.99/month (includes advanced filtering and exclusive events).
q11: Can I pause or cancel anytime?
a11: Yes! You can cancel your subscription anytime from your account settings — no questions asked. You'll continue to receive matches until the end of your current billing period.
a12: If you don't have at least 2 meaningful in-person meetups in your first 30 days, we'll refund you in full. Just email billing@beyondrounds.app with a brief note, and we'll process your refund within 5-7 business days.
